description:
The `Tab` component should be rendered inside the `Tabs` component.
It is used for generating a tab and holding some sort of content
to be displayed when active.

children.description: The content to display when the tab is active.

icon.description: An optional icon to display in the tab.

label.description: An optional label to display in the tab.

label2.description: An optional second line label to display in the tab.

checked.description:
Boolean if the Tab is currently active. This is managed by the
`Tabs` component.

onChange.description:
A function to call when the tab is clicked. This is managed by the
`Tabs` component.

ink.description: Ink that has been injected from the `injectInk` HOC. Do not use.
